item.description: Rhode Island State Representative Dan Gordon will be discussing NDAA, and other unconstitutional legislation being thrust upon us by this current administration.  Representative Gordon will also be sharing some good news and offering other solutions on how we can stop this madness.  Please join us at the next "Rhode Island Oath Keepers" meeting Tuesday 3/20/12 @ 7 p.m. Sonoma Grille, 7366 Post Rd, North Kingstown, RI 02852 401-295-0800 Easy to get to,  All are welcome,  RSVP if you can and tell a friend.  Go to: "Rhode Island Oath Keepers" on facebook or oathkeepers.org for more info. "Yours in Liberty" Randy Swanson  401-952-5015
item.name: Rep. Dan Gordon, guest speaker at Rhode Island Oath Keepers meeting
